c63b1107-6df4-43b9-ba20-84dd64a9ec9f.name: Directional
c63b1107-6df4-43b9-ba20-84dd64a9ec9f.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

8b4ae012-49fa-4e66-8256-71c32c4fdb9a.name: Tough Skin
8b4ae012-49fa-4e66-8256-71c32c4fdb9a.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

2ed3ecca-6828-418e-b3a0-33e139faf7d7.name: Oxygen Storage
2ed3ecca-6828-418e-b3a0-33e139faf7d7.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

9a7e24e6-4c34-48b4-b765-1211ec0de448.name: Oxygen Storage
9a7e24e6-4c34-48b4-b765-1211ec0de448.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

0b43427f-f98f-4a59-826d-74e0b181769e.name: Oxygen Storage
0b43427f-f98f-4a59-826d-74e0b181769e.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

2e5da0c9-ab8d-419b-9948-ce093fe9b75b.name: Oxygen Storage
2e5da0c9-ab8d-419b-9948-ce093fe9b75b.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

09172cd1-e2d7-4292-a038-66fcde67ac77.name: Oxygen Storage
09172cd1-e2d7-4292-a038-66fcde67ac77.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

09b55a36-93bb-4418-a32b-90e68b83cd23.name: Diffuse
09b55a36-93bb-4418-a32b-90e68b83cd23.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

dd85774e-52e6-4ba4-a5e2-36ae36496b28.name: Homogenous
dd85774e-52e6-4ba4-a5e2-36ae36496b28.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ef78e7db-fa29-4b7d-9f8e-be0907f0d979.name: No Blood
ef78e7db-fa29-4b7d-9f8e-be0907f0d979.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

11834705-5d6d-4062-84ac-59864b0b8db6.name: No Brain
11834705-5d6d-4062-84ac-59864b0b8db6.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

0fedd644-4b21-40e3-868f-0fef1cdc1b40.name: No Eyes
0fedd644-4b21-40e3-868f-0fef1cdc1b40.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

30fa236e-85e2-4356-9812-cb6a2e47a0bb.name: No Head
30fa236e-85e2-4356-9812-cb6a2e47a0bb.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

a9b24918-23ab-4494-82f4-59a5ee877c6b.name: No Neck
a9b24918-23ab-4494-82f4-59a5ee877c6b.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

27e114fc-8009-429f-92e2-f574bea21252.name: No Vitals
27e114fc-8009-429f-92e2-f574bea21252.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

1b5d1afc-ddd2-480d-80a6-bb6dcae056a6.name: Unliving
1b5d1afc-ddd2-480d-80a6-bb6dcae056a6.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

3172c91e-8889-4d6c-a20a-6d183c55842c.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

9034db05-d87b-4d8b-989b-cb6eed4459bc.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

9f1a141c-2c1c-4397-aa8c-052d9748ff2e.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
